summary: This document appears to be a financial record or invoice list detailing water treatment and cooling tower maintenance services performed at a property referred to as 'Epstein Tower' between 2016 and 2018. It includes service dates, descriptions, and reference codes, indicating regular maintenance and testing for legionella.

events.title: Epstein Tower Cooling Tower Disinfection
events.description: Cleaning and disinfection service performed on the cooling tower at Epstein Tower.

events.title: Legionella Test at Cooling Tower
events.description: Legionella testing and 90-day tower inspection performed.

keyFacts: The document records regular water treatment and maintenance services for a cooling tower at 'Epstein Tower' from 2016 to 2018.
Specific services included monthly maintenance, cleaning, disinfection, and testing for legionella bacteria.
The records indicate a systematic maintenance schedule, with services logged in multiple months across several years.
